phrases: Did you ever even think that the guy might be you?
Still... even if it is just once...
I want him to think of me as a girl.
He is definitely realized this time.
Your hard work has paid off!
What on earth should I do?!
You do not need to do anything.
You did everything you had to.
Now it is all down to Otani-kun's reaction.
I would better go tell him I was just kidding!
I do not care if he is an idiot!
I know I will be in the way, but let me hang out with you on the class trip.
It is fine by me, but what about Otani-kun?
You have not spoken to him at all since then.
That is because I do not want to!
I do not know what to do!
And when we finally have our class trip too...
I do not care about the class trip!
I just remembered there is something I have to do!
I am going to go on ahead!
Hey, what do you think I should do?
Go with whatever you think is best, just tell her what you are thinking now.
What I am thinking now, huh?
I just wanted him to think about me...
Can I really become a normal girl?
Did you ever think that the guy might be you?
After going around in a big circle, I finally told Otani how I feel.
Just what is going to happen to me now?
I was so preoccupied with telling him how I feel.
I never even thought about what would come after.
Now it is all down to Otani-kun's reaction.
To tell you the truth, Koizumi, I have liked you all this time too.
I bet he is going to say...
He will definitely say something like that!
For now, I will just avoid being alone with him.
It will be fine as long as I do not speak to him.
How long have I slept in?
You forgot we have got our class trip today, did not you?!
I have been calling you for ages!
The bus to the airport is about to leave!
Was not there anyone to wake you up?
Everyone else at home was asleep as well.
I am asking the two of you, do not pull a comedy act at a time like this.
I was planning on not being alone with Otani for a while...
I will go take care of the tickets.
How could you sleep in on such an important day, you idiot?!
I have not said anything yet!
You have been calling me an idiot for so long it is really starting to piss me off!
Is the guy you like really me?
Asking so directly is bad for my heart!
Is there any other way to ask?
There is not, that I know of.
Even when I tried so hard to confess, you brushed me off.
Why do you have to make me relive that scene now.
If saying sorry were enough, there would be no need for cops in this world.
I wanted to say it earlier, but you kept trickling away!
What do you mean trickling away?!
You make me sound like a shishiotoshi!
Do you realize that you have not heard a thing I have said?!
Could not you have said it in a way that is easier to understand?
I said in very simple terms!
I came right out and told you!
You are the one that wanted me to think in the first place!
What is going on here, All Hanshin-Kyojin?
Maybe they were together till morning...
If you ask the seagull, Have the herring come?
I am just a migrating bird.
The plane trip was so long...
Do not you think you are being overly self-conscious?
I have to think of a way to dump him five seconds before he dumps me.
You do not know if he is going to reject you, though.
Do not get your hopes up about ever finding a boyfriend, amazon.
Are not we All Hanshin-Kyojin partners?
I... I do not get you...
To Otani, I am just an amazon... and a comedy partner.
The thought that I might like him never even crossed his mind.
Even if I did confess, it will never lead anywhere with someone who thinks like that.
But now that you have told him, you are not a part of All Hanshin-Kyojin anymore, right?
So at the very least, you have escaped from being his comedy partner.
You have worked hard and taken another step forward.
Hey Nobu-chan, what will happen to me now?
Even though you slept so much that it made you late?
I have not been getting enough sleep.
Is that because you have been thinking about Koizumi-san?
Do not make me hit you, you idiot.
Someone this scary cannot be Otani... sniff, sniff, sniff...
Ok, you are free to explore this area, but remember to meet back here at the right time.
Sensei, the late couple is not waking up.
But they did not even wake up when we stuffed snacks in their mouths.
What is wrong with those two?!
Guess there is not much we can do.
Call them by cell phone and meet up with them later.
Koizumi, I cannot go out with a giant like you.
I will be going out with this crab from now on.
She was just caught today, and is still fresh!
Why has it turned out like this?
We are at the Otaru Canal Craft Hall
I have no idea what you are saying!
So we just follow the Otaru canal?
She said they will get here soon, so we should run into them if we just wait around here.
What do you mean I took a step forward?
This is definitely a step backwards.
If I knew it was going to be like this,
But now that awkward topic is all I can think of...
Maybe I should not have told him.
I really want to go home.
It totally suits the atmosphere here!
It would be embarrassing and touristy.
Let us go buy some souvenirs.
I wonder how they are doing...
I hope Risa and Otani are all right.
The driver even gave us nicknames.
He said, How about I call you guys'Suke-san' and'Kaku-san'?
You can bring Komon-san along next time.
It was a cold joke, but it was great!
But we just did the 10 minute course.
Should we go for the 30 minute course?
If we do that, we will not have any money for souvenirs.
Then we can just make some cash by doing a comedy act here.
Could it be that things are finally going well between the two of you?
I would forgotten all about that awkward feeling.
I am going to go get some juice.
You guys decide where to go next.
Maybe I should not have confessed after all.
It would have probably been better if I would forgotten this crush and we would just stayed a comedy duo.
If I knew it would be this awkward...
He still has not come back.
I wonder if he is deep in thought again...
Well, do you want to go shopping around here for a bit, then?
What do you want to do, Risa?
I am going to go look for him.
If I hurry, I can still make it.
I will tell him to just pretend that nothing happened.
If we pretend that nothing happened...
I found the bear curry that a friend asked me to get, so I was going to buy some.
Let us just pretend that nothing happened.
Did you ever even think that the guy might be you?
You asked me to think about it...
If you are asking me whether I like you or not...
You are the only one I can make a big fuss and get excited about riding a rickshaw with.
But we have been a comedy duo for such a long time...
I do not think I can suddenly see you as my girlfriend.
What is with that serious expression?!
It is fine, it is fine.
Let us just pretend that nothing happened.
I actually came to say that.
We will just stay All Hanshin-Kyojin from now on, okay?
If you want, maybe we can join a comedy troupe!
Okay, hurry up and buy your bear curry or seal curry or whatever.
I will go catch up with the others, okay?
I knew from the start that it would not go smoothly.
Even my confession was just to get him to see me as a girl for a bit.
Like I said, what is this about bear curry?
Still, having it said to my face... it still hurts.
What is that supposed to mean?!
For some reason I feel like having bear curry now.
Darling, please do not speak right now.
Koizumi, what do you want to do during our free time in Hakodate?
I want to get a soft serve!
